entry.title: $2228 // Big 2bd Private Yard Bedstuy Lots of Windows and Dishwasher
entry.content:
-Rest of January and one month free!

- You cant get closer to the best cafes bars and restaurants in the area!

-Newly renovated designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, microwave and granite countertops. Cherry oak hardwood floors.

-High ceilings and large windows that bring in abundant amounts of natural light.

- Outdoor space (common courtyard) and a private backyard!

- Bike Storage!!

-3 blocks from the Kingston/Throop Avenue, C Train and near the Nostrand A express train. Private yard area. Gross is $2,400 with 1 month free on a 14 month lease. We can help you find roommates on Nooklyn

About The Hood:
The birthplace of The Notorious B.I.G. and Jay-Z, Bedford-Stuyvesant (commonly known as Bed-Stuy) is a central Brooklyn neighborhood known for its historic and beautiful brownstones. Summers mean tree-lined sidewalks and block parties under the sun. There's a mix of long-time residents and newcomers who live in Bed-Stuy and frequent the many locally-owned cafes, restaurants, and bars.
